title: Heritage Homestead Luxury Less than One Hour from Christchurch with Gourmet Dining
description:
Cradled by rolling hills and neighbouring vineyards, the family-run Tipapa Estate is a breathtaking homestead offering an oasis of serenity an hour's drive from Christchurch. Overflowing with heritage charm and catering for only six guests at a time, this exclusive country retreat has been effortlessly restored from its origins as a 19th-century sheep station into a lavish home-away-from-home. Unwind amid a picturesque landscape of sprawling lawns and park-like grounds - complete with a lovely outdoor pool.

Enjoy homecooked fare in the gourmet kitchen, spend summer days feeling a warm breeze on the veranda, stroll through the seasons in the manicured gardens or cosy up on winter nights by one of two fireplaces. Feel like exploring? Venture out to the nearby Waipara wineries for an indulgent day of vine-hopping or head down to Motunau Beach for coastal walks, wildlife viewing or a spot of fishing.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Relax on arrival with a welcome glass of wine, beer or soft drink per person
- Spend your first evening indulging in a delicious two-course dinner for two
- Wake up to a delicious daily breakfast spread of homemade sourdough toast, fresh fruit, eggs and more
- Enjoy the comfort of your super king bed a little longer with leisurely 1pm checkout

**Travelling as a family?** Two children (11 and under) stay free with breakfast and welcome soft drink when you upgrade to a spacious Garden Suite.

**This deal has NO peak surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.
offer_address: 40 Motunau Beach Road, Greta Valley 7387, New Zealand

title: Heritage Homestead Luxury One Hour from Christchurch
description:
Cradled by rolling hills and neighbouring vineyards, the family-run Tipapa Estate is a breathtaking homestead offering an oasis of serenity an hour's drive from Christchurch. Once part of a 10,000-acre sheep station, this 19th-century estate radiates heritage charm through its white-washed timber cladding and four large and luxurious bedrooms, each offering breathtaking views. The proud owners have curated a welcoming environment that ensures an idyllic retreat for visitors seeking a peaceful weekend or a romantic escape.

Stroll through the extensive gardens dotted with orchards and cherry trees or mingle with new friends in the communal lounge and dining rooms. Warm summer days call for a dip in the outdoor pool while wintery nights invite a drink or two around the fireplace. Enjoy homecooked fare in the fabulous kitchen or ask the owners for their best local recommendations. When you want to explore further, venture down the road to stunning Motunau Beach, visit Hamner Spring Thermal Pools & Spa, located only an hour away, or take a road trip to Gore Bay and Cathedral Cliffs to admire the naturally dramatic coastline.
offer_address: 40 Motunau Beach Road, Greta Valley 7387, New Zealand
